New Records: Chris Flexen ended a 23-game winless streak with his first victory since May 8, 2024.
Key Match Events: The White Sox scored seven runs in the fifth inning, including an error by the Angels' shortstop, to secure a 7-0 victory.
Pre-Game Insights: The White Sox were aiming to avoid setting a record for three consecutive losses.
Post-Match Reflections: Chicago White Sox interim manager Grady Sizemore expressed excitement about the team's performance and future prospects.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked the final home series for the White Sox, who finished 23-58 at home.
